description: Sample goals for EAI Challenge - English version
goals: Make coffee in the kitchen
Wash clothes and hang them to dry
Clean the living room and arrange the sofa cushions
Find my keys and take them to the bedroom
Prepare a sandwich for lunch
Read a book and then turn off the lights
Open the window and let in some fresh air
Cook pasta and serve it with sauce
Water the plants in the garden
Take out the trash and recycling
Charge my phone and laptop
Set the table for dinner with plates, forks, and glasses
Fold the laundry and put it away in the closet
Check the mail and sort it into important and junk
Vacuum the carpet and then dust the furniture
Mix flour, sugar, and eggs to make cake batter
Drive to the grocery store and buy milk and bread
Answer the phone and take a message
Turn on the TV and watch the news
Write a shopping list for tomorrow
